title: Virtual Assistant for Airbnb/Short-term Rentals
job_overview:
The Virtual Assistant for Airbnb/Short-Term Rentals provides remote support to property owners or managers in overseeing day-to-day operations of vacation rentals. Responsibilities include managing guest inquiries and bookings, coordinating check-in/check-out instructions, updating listings, handling guest communication, addressing issues or complaints, monitoring reviews, scheduling cleaning and maintenance, and ensuring smooth, high-quality guest experiences. This role requires excellent communication skills, attention to detail, and familiarity with property management tools.
